name: Kill The Enemy (Socket94)
description: Zombie Apocalypse 3072 is a game where its the year 3072 and you are spawned into an old suburban town and you have to fight zombies and all you have is one primary weapon (AKM) and one secondary weapon (COLT M911). This game was made for a game jam (Brackeys Game Jam 2022) and this fits the theme your not alone because there are med kits around the map to assist you as you fight the zombies.
